website_summaries.verdict: A durable choice that looks great, although some had problems assembling it.
pros: Seat and storage can hold up to 400 pounds of weight
Material holds up well to sun, wind, and rain
cons: Some felt that this arrived smaller than expected
The storage area is not waterproof
You may need a second pair of hands to put this piece together

customer_reviews.title: The biggest issue is that the top is not very sturdy. It is advertised as a bench seat yet ...
customer_reviews.text: It does the job of storing items. A bit smaller than I expected, but that is my fault for not reading the dimensions carefully. The biggest issue is that the top is not very sturdy. It is advertised as a bench seat yet even my student who are less than 100 lbs feel like they are going to fall through the top.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cushion sucks.
customer_reviews.text: The bench itself is awesome and the size is perfect. Problem is the cushion - it is crap! Don't expect to use it, if you buy this plan on buying a new one immediately - I had it for all of two weeks before it split open and frayed rendering it useless...btw, no one even had a chance to sit in it before it started to unravel. Plan accordingly.
customer_reviews.author: patricia Cadena

customer_reviews.title: Nice size. Doubles for seats
customer_reviews.text: Handy. Nice size. Doubles for seats. This probably is "user error", but we looked and looked for the bolts and wrench. Finally we schlepped around to 5 different stores, found the parts, and put the bench together. (2 hours and $16 later.) The bolts were discovered later in a small plastic bag inside the bag covering the cushion.🤦🏻‍♀️. So, take everything out of it's packaging and enjoy your bench. It's not waterproof, being woven, but its smart looking and nice quality.
customer_reviews.author: mft

customer_reviews.title: Very nice! Be careful when opening top as cushion is first thing to unpack.
customer_reviews.text: It's not waterproof so plan on keeping it under cover. I love it. Nice sturdy bottom, easy instructions (I used a drill where I could, but allen wrench is provided). BE CAREFUL OPENING! The cushion is the first thing you will see when you open, so don't use a box cutter to open if you're heavy handed--you could possibly cut into the cushion as there isn't any protection except thin plastic wrap around it. All in all I LOVE THIS BENCH. Well worth the money. Has chains to keep the lid from falling back, simple to assemble, not too heavy. Looks very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: nice patio storage
customer_reviews.text: I like this product - but the assembly was a bit of a pain. The actual putting together was about what you'd expect from having to put anything together yourself. The hard part was latching the lid to the body of the chest. Esp if your eyes are a little older and your grip isn't as steady as it used to be - this part has gotta be exact! And, to make matters worse, once it's on there, it comes back off way too easy. Again, nice product overall - just get a friend to help you put that lid on!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Frazier

customer_reviews.title: Functional piece and attractive too!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and functional piece. Love this so far. I do think assembly was kinda of tricky, but once I figured out a way to elevate the base so screws were at an even point, assembly went quickly. I needed something with storage that matched another piece of furniture on the balcony. This piece added so much to our little space! It’s nice to have another place to sit to look out at our ocean view.
customer_reviews.author: Luckylotery

customer_reviews.title: Make sure no broken wicker weaves before putting together otherwise great for price point
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than anticipated but it is the size described. I just should have bought a bigger one to fit all pool toys. Biggest complain is the front plastic wicker is cut, broken or defective therefore we suspect it will all come undone within the first year. The rest of box is sturdy, looks good and appears to be ok to sit on. Strap down cushion though because every time it’s opened cushion falls off
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Galli

customer_reviews.title: Not functional
customer_reviews.text: After assembling the bench, I decided to test it out. I sat down and immediately fell into the storage compartment. I am only 125. This is definitely not made for adults to sit on. It also has no lining to keep out water, dirt, or bugs, therefore is not adequate for outdoor storage. It is an attractive piece of outdoor furniture, if you don't need functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble if you have all the parts
customer_reviews.text: The first two arrived well. Pretty easy to assemble, but the alignments are not correct making it a bit more difficult than what it should be to assemble. We liked it enough that we ordered a third one, and that brought the ratings down. It was missing the screws to assemble it. The company was quick a responding to my inquiry but it took 2 weeks to get a small bag of screws. Finally, when we went to assemble the bench, we found that wicker was covering the holes. So it distorted the webbing. Now it looks like a cheap bench.
customer_reviews.author: RandomThoughts

customer_reviews.title: So Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: This is 💯 % not waterproof. It actually holds water because there are no holes in the bottom..shouldn’t have that problem for something promoted as waterproof. We even bought a “waterproof” bag to try and make it work. Unfortunately nones seem to fit or they leak as well. I’m now searching for plastic containers that will fit to keep our outdoor toys in. I shouldn’t have to spend more money on this. Buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Jaebly

customer_reviews.title: Hinges are trash. Can’t adjust misaligned seat.
customer_reviews.text: The hinges are very loose and the screws keep turning when tightened so you can’t adjust the alignment of the top. Unfortunately the top is misaligned and I fell right into the lower compartment when I sat on in it. Sure glad my 80 year mother didn’t try it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This completed my deck
customer_reviews.text: I like this storage bench. It's sturdy and has a large storage capacity. Not sure what the weight rating is on the lid but can comfortably seat an adult, maybe 2. The only issue I had was the assembly. It was a little confusing and the holes didn't seem to line up right. Eventually, I got it put together but not without a bit of swearing. Given a choice, I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: LMFerron

customer_reviews.title: the box is fine, the pillow on the top is super think
customer_reviews.text: the box is fine, the pillow on the top is super think, flimsy and the cloth cheap and ripped. i guess you can make your own for a few buck with better material. you can also just toss it and it's a weaved pattern and serves a decent bench.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Lauron

customer_reviews.title: Horrible product. Cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: Horrible product. Cheap materials. hinges on lid fail with every open causing the lid to disattach. poor instructions and overall very poor quality. Not water resistant at all. This box is the worst buy
customer_reviews.author: jeff Moore

customer_reviews.title: Nice bench with storage. Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Nice enough quality. I wouldn’t say a big person should sit on this. Definitely not water proof as far as keeping things inside it dry if it rains. The first time it rain opened it up and everything was totally drenched. But looks nice and works great for storing my kids outdoor toys in.
customer_reviews.author: LD

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived missing parts (side of the bench) . The company was responsive and I received the missing side in a week. Unfortunately, when I went to put it together, 4 of the bolt holes didn't line up. The product is cheaply made and is now even less sturdy with partially inserted bolts.
customer_reviews.author: T. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT  BUY
customer_reviews.text: This is flimsy and very difficult to assemble. Should be easy but the tool provide is not the right size.. can't hand tighten. So must use tool a half turn for whole screw. That 5 - 10 min per screw. Then the bottom the last piece won't fit unless all other screws are loose. That sucks....
customer_reviews.author: Sara Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: My husband put this together by himself and did not seem to have difficulty (at least he did not complain to me) it looks decent. It is not waterproof, so all the contents got wet and the cushion completely absorbed every drop of water, it's like a regular pillow with a cloth pillow case. If you are not going to make the cover plastic at least make the inside plastic.
customer_reviews.author: Lissie

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble and looks nice
customer_reviews.text: Storage container was compact, just the right size for our little patio. It was fairly easy to assemble even with the IKEA like instructions and it looks nice for plastic bamboo weave. Only con is that the cushion is not secured and can blow off. We are putting some velcro on it
customer_reviews.author: Jim Easton

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Once I assembled the storage bench I was very satisfied with the look of the bench. It matched my outdoor patio furniture perfectly. I then went to put the cushions away for the rain and the storage box would literally only hold 3 cushions at a time and the cushions had to be bent in order for the top to close. I am very disappointed. I need at least TWO MORE of these to hold all the cushions.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Osche

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: This box was a gift for my husband. He loved it! And sat on this bench often, unfortunately the weave broke in a couple places. I would not recommend anyone over 20 pounds to sit on this bench.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kusiak

customer_reviews.title: Cannot sit on bench; poor design
customer_reviews.text: Even a toddler can't sit on this bench without the top falling inward because there is not much of a lip for the lid to rest on. Worse part is there is no handle to open the top, so after it falls inward, you need to stick your fingers (watch out for pinching) or several tools in between the sides to pry the lid back open. Beware of injury. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Storage seat
customer_reviews.text: This is not sturdy at all. If you weigh more than 20 lbs. It caves in. For the price it is not a good item. I would not recommend it if you need it for an extra seating space on a porch or patio. Looks good but not practical as a seat at all. Not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Madalyn Mak

customer_reviews.title: This is really nice. I use it indoors so I don't know ...
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice. I use it indoors so I don't know if it's waterproof or not, but it's nicely don't that you can have it indoor as furniture without cramping your style. Very cool
customer_reviews.author: Mensa Man

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and expensive look
customer_reviews.text: Excellent buy ... Looks great on our porch. We live in 3rd floor condo at the beach and bench is placed on outside railing which is open to the outside, except for screen. Had a blowing rain the other day and the inside of bench stayed dry. Cushion added delight, and water just beads up and is easily wiped away.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Leary

customer_reviews.title: Love it. It looks beautiful on my balcony
customer_reviews.text: Love it. It looks beautiful on my balcony, gives me some storage for the cushions when winter comes and it's comfortable to sit on. Assembly was a little difficult at the end to put the base on, I had to loosen the sides to get it together... But after that it fit tight and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Haylee And Karl

customer_reviews.title: Great additional seating and storage combo
customer_reviews.text: Easy to set up. The top lid doesn’t close ALL the way, but it closes enough. Plenty of space for our outdoor toys and the extra seating is an added benefit
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Great product, large storage!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect match for our deck furniture. Company was great in providing a return/resolve solution as the base got damaged during transit. Recommend for anybody be looking to store chair cushions and more.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Gerber

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good product
customer_reviews.text: There were a number of people in previous reviews talking about how hard it was to put this thing together. I am a small single female and didn't have any problem at all. It took me about 30 minutes or less to put this product together. The only downside is the cushion. It's rather flimsy. It hasn't worn like other people said it did immediately, but it still isn't the most impressive. However as a whole the product fit my needs for a bench with seating and storage.
customer_reviews.author: Ledra

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Poorly manufactured, holes for screws did not align, the plastic weave is already coming apart and not structurally sound to sit on, not sure why they would include the cushion. Look elsewhere for a higher rated option.
customer_reviews.author: Frozen Tundra

customer_reviews.title: Great for storage
customer_reviews.text: Even though this is made for the outdoors, it's the storage i needed inside and it fits in really well. It's also very sturdy for sitting on which i was skeptical of.
customer_reviews.author: Eastern shore guy

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made
customer_reviews.text: This storage bench looks decent in the pictures, but it is very poorly made. Amazon returned one because it was damaged in shipping prior to my receipt of it. So, I re-ordered it. This one was also damaged. The preinstalled hinges were bent on the lid, so it wouldn't close properly. So I'd avoid this product all together. It isn't worth the money or hassle.
customer_reviews.author: Brett Morales

customer_reviews.title: 50/50 shot you'll like it if you order it.
customer_reviews.text: When you finally get it together it looks nice. Took hours. The tool that comes with it is hard to deal with. Most of the holes didn't lined up so I had to make my own. The latch was put on twisted from the factory and the top wouldn't close. Glad I'm only using it to hide my chlorine bottles on my lani.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wanted it for storing towels by the pool but everything got soaked with the first little bit of rain. NG!
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: A little flimsier than I thought it would be. But not too bad. Does the job and looks nice
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Good piece.
customer_reviews.text: Good piece...very sturdy once put together. Assembly was good. I'm using as coffee table indoors. Comes with cushion...you can use if you wish. Would recommend. Demensions are pretty accurate...roomy inside.
customer_reviews.author: Idalia Ruiz

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived broken, instructions weren't included. Screws are stripped. Disappointed. EDIT: Seller acknowledged the problem and sent a replacement part. However, it's a part from a different set and won't work with my bench.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Horton

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my sunroom to store toys for guest and miscellaneous items. Only flaw is the lid does not stay open by itself. It also provides extra seating when I have guest over and we're hanging out in the sunroom.
customer_reviews.author: Gyotaku

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: It is nice enough, looks well, the bottom of the inside storage compartment could be sturdier
customer_reviews.author: Jaime

customer_reviews.title: Not worth $120
customer_reviews.text: It’s decent looking . To small . Not waterproof or sealed what so ever . Bottom is a clear crappy piece of plastic . This is hardly worth $120 . UPDATE day 3 piece of garbage . Fell through the top sitting on it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not to be used as a bench!
customer_reviews.text: We were hoping to use this "bench" as extra seating to go with our patio furniture. WARNING!! DO NOT USE AS A BENCH!! The top slid into the bench when our very lean 9 year old grandson sat on it! I would have returned it had my husband not demolished the box it came in. He said we could use it for storage. Total WASTE OF MONEY.
customer_reviews.author: J.S.Agoura

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: The deck box was easy to put together and looks great. It has a fair amout of storage space but most of all I like the bench seat. It gives us more seating around our fire pit.
customer_reviews.author: dw7990

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking
customer_reviews.text: Directions not the best but I like the finished product
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Mcelrath

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, sturdy storage bench.
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy storage bench. So far cat claw proof, which is fantastic. I have 3 cats that love to destroy my furniture.
customer_reviews.author: HB

customer_reviews.title: Check your pieces before you start
customer_reviews.text: The first one came missing a piece, so we had to send it back. The second one came in, and went together easily. Added the perfect storage spot next to our pool and the additional seating is great.
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: If looking for storage when it rains this is not the bench you want
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in this bench. Doesn't close completely without cushion on top. The storage area fills with water when it rains but doesn't let it out. I wanted a bench with storage for when it rains so my cushions wouldn't get wet. Now I have another thing to put inside when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: CWL

customer_reviews.title: Nice piece that's easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Nice piece that's easy to put together. Pay attention to the dimensions because it will not fit cushions, only throw pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Mom-to-2

customer_reviews.title: Great bench, well made, but cushion. stained easily
customer_reviews.text: This bench is really well made and fits perfectly on my balcony. It’s very sturdy. Unfortunately my daughter dropped a crumb and it stained the cushion immediately. I’ve tried everything to get the stain out and nothing has worked. Otherwise I would have given more stars.
customer_reviews.author: Omar Shahin

customer_reviews.title: Fragile and not long lasting
customer_reviews.text: We have had this storage bench for a few months and it is falling apart. The wicker is coming apart and the hinges that open the top are broken. It is also not weight bearing as a bench since my 40 lb child broke through when sitting on it. Do not recommend at this price point.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation
customer_reviews.text: awesome box/ bench easy to put together would recommend two people to do the job makes it easiest! Perfect to store grill cover when not using and cushions and pillows on patio! Highly recommend! Box and packing were perfect no problems!
customer_reviews.author: Erin Kissinger

customer_reviews.title: but slides into the hinge and so falls off easily (it fell on my son's foot as he was ...
customer_reviews.text: This is very poorly constructed -- the lid is not secured, but slides into the hinge and so falls off easily (it fell on my son's foot as he was moving it). it is not water proof at all and the cushion is thin and flimsy. Definitely do not recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly and sturdy.
customer_reviews.text: We bought a similar product and it was hard to assemble and it didn’t fit. A couple of bolt holes were in the wrong place:/ We returned that product and got this one a couple of days later and it was so much easier to assemble and it was much sturdier:)
customer_reviews.author: Lars Hafell

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.text: Far smaller than it looks. Will not even take dining chair seat cushions without squeezing them and the included seat pad also won't fit in the box. It's also just an open-weave wicker so anything inside is bound to get wet when it rains.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Guidice, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for shoe storage for my daughter to use at her back door. It's really pretty and sturdy. It's roomy but fit perfectly on the landing where it sets.
customer_reviews.author: delena

customer_reviews.title: Horrible construction
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this product! It is so poorly made and once I put it together and sat on it I fell through it! Screw holes didn't line up and hinge screws were stripped apon delivery, absolutely the worst construction I've ever cam across.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together. I am a 65 year old women and I found it easy to put together, all parts were included and had everything you need! Holds allot !
customer_reviews.author: Susan Busby

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Some of the holes predrilled for assembly didn’t line up perfectly. The information said it held 300lbs for seating and this won’t hold a small child. The lid collapses into the base.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works nice for me
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to go lakeside to hold summer toys, buckets shovels etc. works perfect
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: storage
customer_reviews.text: it falls in when you set on it. returning it
customer_reviews.author: Shawna W.

customer_reviews.title: Fall hazard
customer_reviews.text: One of the most complicated piece of furniture I've ever put together and once it's put together, you'll fall through without even putting a lot of weight on it.
customer_reviews.author: Bridgette Hardie

customer_reviews.title: Should have a lining for outdoor use.
customer_reviews.text: Hard to assemble. The tools to assemble were missing. I though it was a return from another customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mona J. Reedy

customer_reviews.title: A little smaller than you might imagine.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really great bench. It seems sturdy and comfortable. Even though I reviewed dimensions ahead of purchase, it seems a little smaller than I envisioned.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Ward

customer_reviews.title: Very Pleased!
customer_reviews.text: This Is the perfect size and quality I was looking for in a bench to store cushions. Easy to put together, very sturdy, and classic style’
customer_reviews.author: Katy Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. Great purchase! Very easy to assemble and looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Weimar

customer_reviews.title: This is a very good storage table
customer_reviews.text: This is a very good storage table. Be careful when putting it together that you don't tighten the screws until it is totally together or you will not be able to install the bottom. Otherwise it looks good, holds a lot and the cushion is good too.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha S Kessler

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect in my back yard. Larger than what we thought
customer_reviews.author: The Rubin's

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Top cover rivets popped out and plexiglass broken when I received it. Had to make it work as I needed the bench. Do like the product but wish it wasn't damaged.
customer_reviews.author: KatB

customer_reviews.title: Good value for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Delivered quickly quality is excellent great storage capacity. Only issue was screw alignment . Had to leave one screw out.
customer_reviews.author: caryn r calie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my needs. Easy to assembe.. Steel construction, very strong.
customer_reviews.author: i8adodofly

customer_reviews.title: Not as easy as it looks
customer_reviews.text: Awkward to put together. Takes more time than it should.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Molter

customer_reviews.title: Missing hinge
customer_reviews.text: Hinge pin is missing, 1 of 2. Hopefully they will send one!
customer_reviews.author: KEITH FULLER

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money and my time
customer_reviews.text: This product did not line up. I would not buy it again. I
customer_reviews.author: Susantable purchase

customer_reviews.title: Easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, large enough for pool chemicals/supplies or a few pool toys, and an attractive seating area for the deck. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Defective hinge and screw threads
customer_reviews.text: It looks beautiful, buuuuuut, mine came with two defects: one hinge was installed backward so I wasn’t able to latch the trunk cover of the left side. The other defect was the lower holes for the back screws. These holes threads were a little bit smaller so the screws only entered 1/ 4 “. I was then forced to use black tie wraps to compensate the defective hinge and the defective screws-threads. I’ll be happy if someone tell me if I can remove the rivets of the hinge so I can install it correctly. See my photos and videos for more details.
customer_reviews.author: Looking for a Solution

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very nice extra storage in my screen room.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: Put the whole thing together per the instructions. I got the the last step of putting the lid on and discovered they riveted on one of wrong hinges.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Darr

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bench at a good price!!
customer_reviews.text: The bench is very sturdy and of good quality. It was easy to assemble and looks nice on our patio. I would purchase it again
customer_reviews.author: kentucky

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Good quality item, but two of the screws will not tighten
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these for outside on our pool walk. We liked them so much we ordered another one. My husband put the first two together and the newest one I did myself. Very easy to assemble. These look awesome.
customer_reviews.author: M Gee

customer_reviews.title: Such a wonderful storage bench!
customer_reviews.text: Great storage bench. We use it to put our grandson's toys in it. We get great compliments as a piece of the furniture!
customer_reviews.author: T. Valdj

product_meta.title: Barton Outdoor Storage Bench Rattan Style Deck Box Wicker Patio Furniture Water Resistance w/Seat Cushion, 60-Gallon, Brown
feature_bullets: ★Ideal solution - Safeguarding seat cushions, firewood, charcoal, dining accessories, garden supplies, grilling equipment, swimming pool accouterments and more
★Large Storage Space - 60 gallon capacity storage can hold a variety of your yard, patio or household storage
★Convenience Side Handle - Convenience size with handle for easily carrying around and water resistance cushion
★Provide addition Seating - This bench provides seating space, while you enjoy the beautiful weather outside
★Perfect Size for Storage - The overall dimension: 40"(L) x 19"(W) x 17"(H); Net weight: 36lbs. It is perfect for all purposes storage

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.5 out of 5 stars144 ratings3.5 out of 5 stars
